dict.acceptation: 论述；（有效地或成功地）处理；惩处；交易；

sent.orig: Investment banking generates fees deal by deal, while brokerage services can generate continuing streams of income.
sent.trans: 投行从其承揽的每宗交易中收取服务费，而经纪服务则可以保证收入的源源不断。

sent.orig: The deal is a new club transfer record and is a straight cash deal.
sent.trans: 本次签约的转会费创下了俱乐部的新高，不涉及任何球员的交换，仅仅是现金支付。

sent.orig: Would deal with nations as equitable law requires individuals to deal with each other.
sent.trans: 我将公正地与其他各国友好相处，像平等地对待个人一样。

sent.orig: Rachel: A deal is a deal, Jill.
My brother a great deal cleverer and he can earn a great deal of money easily.
sent.trans: 我弟弟更聪明，他能轻易地赚到很多钱。
